entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Duncan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:16 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 9.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Cowichan 2:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022
Temperature: 9.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 75 %
Dewpoint: 5.6°C
Wind: SW 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 11 with temperature falling to 7 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 20 early this afternoon. High 11 with temperature falling to 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
